useCase.name: Access Platform and Integrate University Systems

preconditions.precondition: Depositor has access to the platform

successEndConditions.condition: Depositor successfully accesses the platform and integrates with University Systems

useCase.trigger: Depositor initiates access and integration process

mainSequence.step: Auth confirms authentication success to UI
UI fetches user preferences from SI
SI requests user-specific settings from UnivSys
UnivSys provides user settings to SI
SI applies settings and customization to UI
UI requests integration features from SI
SI fetches integration capabilities from UnivSys
UI renders unified management interface from DMP
DMP confirms interface readiness to UI
UI displays familiar and integrated interface to Depositor
